TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ResourceExpressionBuilder extends System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilder

summary.span: 向页分析器提供代码以便为控件属性赋值。

span.span: Provides code to the page parser for assigning property values on a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类创建代码，以在执行页时检索资源值。The class creates code to retrieve resource values when the page is executed. 资源文件通常包含针对特定语言或区域性进行了本地化的信息。A resource file typically contains information localized for a particular language or culture. 资源表达式采用 `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>` 页面中的格式。A resource expression takes the form `<%$ Resources: ClassKey, ResourceKey %>` within the page. 冒号 (： ) 指定要使用的表达式生成器的类型，冒号后面的部分表示类名称和资源键。The part of the expression before the colon (:) designates the type of expression builder to use, and the part after the colon signifies the class name and resource key. 上述表达式将从名为的文件中检索以下值 `ClassKey.resx` ：The preceding expression would retrieve the following value from a file named `ClassKey.resx`: ``` Hello! ``` 当页分析器遇到带有前缀的表达式时 `Resources` ，它将创建类的一个实例 。When the page parser encounters an expression with the `Resources` prefix, it creates an instance of the class. 类计算表达式或生成代码，以在执行页时返回表达式的值。The class either evaluates the expression or generates code to return a value for the expression when the page is executed. 如果在要编译的页面中遇到表达式，则 对象将生成从资源文件中检索指定值的代码。If the expression is encountered in a page that will be compiled, the object generates code that retrieves the specified value from the resource file. 如果在不进行编译的页面中遇到表达式，则在 分析页面时，对象将返回资源文件中的值。If the expression is encountered in a page that will not be compiled, the object returns the value from the resource file when the page is parsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例从资源文件中检索默认货币。The following code example retrieves the default currency from a resource file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/CS/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionBuilder/VB/Default.aspx#1)] 此代码从 App_GlobalResources 目录中名为的资源文件中读取以下值 `Financial.resx` 。This code reads the following value from a resource file named `Financial.resx` in the App_GlobalResources directory. ``` US dollars ```

span.span: The parsed expression contains the class name and resource key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>` 使用无编译功能的页面中遇到形式的表达式时，将调用此方法。This method is called when an expression of the form `<%$ Resources: someResourceKey %>` is encountered in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 它从资源文件中的键/值对中检索相应的值。It retrieves the appropriate value from a key/value pair in a resource file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在创建页面或控件的 CodeDOM 过程中调用。This method is called during the CodeDOM creation for a page or control. 返回的对象的类型为 ，它表示在页执行过程中检索资源值时要调用的方法。The object returned is of the type and represents the method to call when retrieving a resource value during page execution.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示表达式是否可在使用非编译功能的页中计算。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether an expression can be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature.
in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示方法是否已 在类中实现。The property indicates whether the method has been implemented in the class. 必须在表达式生成器内实现，才能在使用非编译功能的页中计算表达式。 must be implemented within an expression builder for an expression to be evaluated in a page that uses the no-compile feature. 支持在未编译的页中计算资源值，因此此属性始终返回 `true` 。 supports evaluation of resource values in non-compiled pages, so this property always returns `true`.

span.span: ASP.NET Expressions Overview
